title: Changing my email when i cant access my old one.
body: I already have this big account where i spent already a big amount of money, and now i want to change the email, but i cant access the old, need urgent help here!

replies.body: Hit up the EU account agents in a ticket by picking "I need help recovering my account". After answering the verification questions, you should be able to have them reset the verified email and sent those to whatever email you're using.
